title: Mastery pages not changing cause u have max pages.....
body:
this is a very shit system where u can't have the max amount of mastery pages because riot won't do a simple fix... this is ruining a lot of games for me personally especially in ranked games cause there is no way to change them.... for example i just had a draven game with bond of stone..... thank god the other team was complete dog shit or we might have lost.... this was very challenging and in all honest might want to be fixed asap 
{{champion:103}}
